column9: I have been taking 80mg/day for about 6 weeks now to treat migraine headaches and have had absolutely no change. column2: nightgallery.tripod.com, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: Just wanted to relate my experience with irregular heartbeat.  I discovered a few things that trigger it in me.  First, chromium does it.  I can't take multivitamins that have chromium in them. Chromium is also in slimfast diet shakes so I avoid them.Gassy foods like brocoli and spinach salad will trigger palps if eaten a lot.I notice palps will start up due to constipation, so must keep that under control.  I hope this helps others prevent palps because they can make you feel miserable.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years
column9: Nadolol is a noncardioselective beta-blocker and a good alternative to expensive  Inderal-LA. It's a lot like Inderal but you only have to take it once a day. I take it for benign essential tremor. It works great with less fuss than Inderal.
